author: SteveL-MSFT
body: PowerShell currently has ETW logging on Windows, but no logging on non-Windows

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Is there no plans to port ETW on Unix?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: I believe .Net settled on [LTTng](http://lttng.org/) for logging, so it's worth a look too.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Closed via #5144 
Tests of the syslog work need to be added, which is tracked by #5312

title: PowerShell logging needs to go to syslog on non-Windows
